text: Eduard "Edi" Bauer (13 February 1894 - 4 March 1948) was an Austrian football player and coach. He played for SK Rapid Wien and the Austrian national football team as striker. He was also coach of the Austrian national football team. Eduard Bauer died in 1948 of complications after an operation. ==Honours== ===Player === * 8 x Austrian Champion: 1912, 1913, 1916, 1917, 1919, 1920, 1921, 1923 * 2 x Austrian Cup: 1919, 1920 * 1 x Final Mitropacup: 1928 * 2 x Best scorer: 1917, 1918 ===Coach=== * 1 x Mitropacup: 1930 * 3 x Austrian Champion: 1929, 1930, 1935 * 1 x Austrian Cup: 1927 Category:Austrian footballers Category:Players of the Austrian national football team Category:Austrian football managers Category:Austria national football team managers Category:1894 births Category:1948 deaths Category:Austrian football forwards Category:Austrian Football Bundesliga top scorers Category:Austrian football champions
title: Eduard Bauer
